title: [lint] end macros with a semicolon guard
body_html: For the type id related masters, -Wpedantic will give a warning that an unnecessary semicolon is being added to the macro invocation. This is a linting change to make sure that we are properly swallowing the macro, and also, explicitly require this macro to also end with a semicolon as other macros in PT1 do.
